comments.comment: Obathuma kawda kiyana eka hemoma dannawa. Eka hanganna be. Obathuma thamai Sundays iwara karapu sebema weeraya. Obathuma ethulu siyaluma hamuda sebalunta e gawurawaya himi wenawa. Niyama weerayo, Rata gena hithapu weerayo obatha saha siyalu uda sebalun pamani. Siyalu wedana daragena obathuma ethulu obathumage anugamikayan thamai me rate sebema weerayo. Mahida mahattayage anduwen thamai youddaya parajaya kale. Eth.. siyalu wedana daragena noselee wedakara ape yudasenapathi saha uda sebalunya. Obathumage sewaya aniwaryayenma ape ratata awashshai. Mokada rate arakshawa denna beri youddaya iwarakaran.......obathumata jaya wewa... idiriyatath rate arakshawa balaporotthu wenawa...

comments.comment: He has matured as a politician now, perhaps its time the people of Sri Lanka think about the safety of our future and our country,  he has given his whole life to our country,  what has  Ranil given for any of us? What did Sirisena give? Mahinda at least manged to stop the war  but that was then,  and i see this is Sarath Fonseka's time to be the leader,  because we need a strong leadership now, we need a leader who has the experience in guerrilla warfare,  and Sarath Fonseka is the best there is in the world,  we do not need FBI or other western Hollywood tarzens to teach our people to fight with terrorists , in fact the west learnt everything about fighting with terrorism from Sri Lankan's.
comments.author: Raj Warnakulasuriya

comments.comment: Spot on!!! He will never get this post because everyone knows that, if he got this post no body would be able to do whatever they wanted. They know that you cannot hoodwink this man. He is straightforward and will do his duty to the best of his ability. And the most important thing is, he will get rid of terrorism, thuggery and the underworld. There are people who depend on these for their survival. So it's wishful thinking on our part to keep on wishing that FM  SF will be given any responsible post.

comments.comment: Never forget the President who jailed the Honourable General after saving our nation from the Tigers. Great speech " SIR " well done. May the blessings of Christ protect you & your family always.

comments.comment: Great speech (the truth hurts, thitha attha). Sirisena and Ranil, you have proved to be total failures in ensuring security of the people of Sri Lanka. Please hand over all Defense matters to Field Marshall Sarath Fonseka, the only man who has the qualification, experience and commitment to eliminate terrorism from Sri Lanka. NO INTERFERENCE with his actions

comments.comment: Well said!!  Dear  Sarath Fonseka our nation urgently needs  a president like you. May God save you for us. Hope we will see that happen sooner than later!!

comments.comment: rate maha janathawani me commit aka dana mama udda hamuda vishramika sebalek ethin methuma nathnam ada apita nidahase husma tikawath ganna wenne na. mama uddaya kare mama uddaya kare kikiya kattiya rata wate giyata methuma uddaya ewara kale. nathnam mewenakota prabakaran rata allala ewaray methuma hamudawa udda me uddahamudawa mehayapu vidiya harima darunuy horunta edak na wada karayata hoda thana awagema konda pana thiyena hoda adithara nayakayek ape rata sampurnayenma sama ansayakma pirihila thiyenne kisima vinayak nathikamin essella ma vinaya hadanna oni oya parliament ake enna 224 denatama na kisima sudusukamak methumata tharam ratak palanaya karanna ethin merata goda ganna nam darunu palakayek konda panathiyena nayakayek  kelin kathakarana kelin wada karana nayakayek awassayay mama hithanne merata uddaya ewara kara wagema rata HORA kamin mankolla karayangen beragena diunu karanna danata enna akama nayakaya methuma vitharay methumata horu bayay akay okun methuma athanata anawata virudda mekiyana kathawa harida balanna me wasara 71 akak apiwa mankolla kapu ake methumata wasara 5 dila balanna Agamula wenas karay akata ape janathawa pela gahenna oni obathumata jayas Sri jayas Sri jayas Sri.  take care always staying safe.
comments.author: Thilakasiri Bandara

comments.comment: You are a great, honest and genuine person who sacrificed your life for the country.The way people of this country treated you and treat you is pathetic.People twist words for their own benefit. comments.comment: This man was a good countryman, but he joined with wrong team and he did enormous harm and shame to the country giving statements against to the country, acting like irresponsible person. Our people know very well about these and how badly affected his statements/act  to the country‚Äôs international image. This was proved by our people, not sending him to parliament by people votes. So be careful and don‚Äôt carried away and jump to a conclusion with his speech, cause he is now a politician and he tries to make use of this opportunity to get votes his next campaign.  He is fake, he concerns more about his benefits and power not people‚Äôs lives. Real countryman never changes what so ever, never go against to the country ever, even take the head off.

comments.comment: 1977  setama   rata palanaya kala   janadepate warun waren wara    udda kala   atte daksa  wesseta  udda   neladareyak wana densil. kobbakaduwa mahtata   uddaya  jayaganda bareunna  .  hatuwa mokakda   kesma janadepate kanak   nerbetawa   neyoga dunna naha .  ada  maae kata karana neladareyathe  oya udda hamudawama tammae   adath heteya . aye uddaya   jaya nogattae.   mahinda .rajapaksa  jandepathe tuma   pathunna pasuwa   udaya pelebada  dqnuwathe una pasuwa atuma  seyaluma hamuda saktemathe karala   udaya  sandha  neyoga nekuthe karala nese parede kata utu karala uddaya nemakala .oya dan kata karana neladareya manma   1969 setama   mamath hamdawa tamae heteya .hamadenama daksa   hamuda neladareen bawa amtak nokaranna. ada enna udahamudapate, guwan hamudapate,  naweka hamudapate  maae ayath daksa  udda neladareen . amma ayat  kalenma  neyogayake denda nohake adaksa dasapaluwan  ratta palanaya karanna . amanesa   maae kata karana  neladerya pamanke  udaaya jaya gatta keyala pumbanna natuwa adda satan kala seyaluma   ranweruwanta gaura karanda. dasepalana nayaktwayata wessasayenma gaura  karanda.  ada  maae palanaya gena yana   dasepaluwangae  durwala tawaya nessa  maae  maha   wenasaya seduunabawa dana ganda. sriklanka matawa   adawatana bawa  dana ganda . nekan boruwata   comment karala   pumbanda appa   sateya  awaboda kara ganda.
comments.author: ranjith ilayperuma

comments.comment: Oba ada katha karapu wachana tika athi rataka arakshawa pilibada gatalu wisadanna. nugath minissu rate ihala putu wala innakan kawadawath ba nagitinna. Oba rate wadagath purawasiyek. E nisa obata thanathuru nambu nama awashya wena ekak naha kiyala hithana. Rate arakshawa pilibada obata sudusu thana labunoth oba obe uthukan ishta karawi yana mathaye lankeeya janathawagen salakiya uthu pirisak obage sahayata innwa. rate mahajanaya washayen rate arakshawa wenuwen bishana thathwaya madaleema obagen balaporoththu wenawa
